verses.name: Judges 12:7
verses.text: And Jephthah judged Israel six years. Then died Jephthah the Gileadite, and was buried in one of the cities of Gilead.

verses.name: Judges 12:8
verses.text: And after him Ibzan of Beth–lehem judged Israel.

verses.name: Judges 12:9
verses.text: And he had thirty sons, and thirty daughters, whom he sent abroad, and took in thirty daughters from abroad for his sons. And he judged Israel seven years.

verses.name: Judges 12:10
verses.text: Then died Ibzan, and was buried at Beth–lehem.

verses.name: Judges 12:11
verses.text: And after him Elon, a Zebulonite, judged Israel; and he judged Israel ten years.

verses.name: Judges 12:12
verses.text: And Elon the Zebulonite died, and was buried in Aijalon in the country of Zebulun.
